GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. use

queryInfo.topic: filters results to only include articles which match topic
queryInfo.sort_by: sorts articles by values for valid article parameters. sorts numeric values numerically and non-numerical values alphabetically. defaults to created_at
queryInfo.order: sorts articles in ascending or descending order. defaults to descending

POST /api/articles.description: adds a new article to the article table in the database. username must match a username from within the users table, and topic must match a topic name in the topics table. article_img_url will have default value if no input is provided for it
